title.narrative: Empowerment and raising voice of ethnic

participating-org.narrative:
Functions: Providing/Giving the assistance to the Executive Committee, The Provincial Standing Committee of Farmers Association in building leadership capacity, initially leading organization setup process, joining activities for the Committee and Provincial Farmer#s Movement and implementing political mission entrusted by the provincial authorities. * Missions: - Conducting various researches and studies, providing expert consultancy within the Executive Committee, the Provincial Standing Committee of the Association especially focusing on giving guidelines, resolutions, programs, duties schedule which are implemented and held by the provincial farmers# movement and the Association. - To be entrusted with the responsibility of supervising and monitoring activities for Farmers Associations that was followed by the Association#s standing rules, the National People#s Congress#s resolution, the Executive Committee#s resolution and various boarding plans and programs directed by the head of the association
Building and managing the provincialinfrastructure, providing equipment and tools for various provincial organizations and ensuring the conditions of activities implementing for the Executive Committee and the Provincial Standing Committee of the Association. - Giving expert consultancy in human resources management; providing policy building process programs for officers, staffs and members within the system according to The Law, and The Association#s standing rules. - Taking the lead in activities instruction, providing services and consultancy, giving teaching supports and vocational trainings for farmers under the direction of the Executive Committee and the Provincial Standing Committee of the Association.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to a sustainable livelihood
